title: Mince and Tatties
ingredients: ["500g (1 1/4 lb) steak mince (butcher's mince only)", '2 large onions, chopped', '1 teaspoon mixed herbs', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', "1 teaspoon Coleman's mustard", '2 large carrots, chopped', 'dash Worcestershire sauce', 'dash Tabasco Sauce', '1 teaspoon Bisto granules', '2 to 4 potatoes, peeled and diced', 'good knob butter']
